future5years: Currently, I work at an interdisciplinary studio that focuses on immersive and interactive experiences. I enjoy this kind of work as it allows me to explore and experiment with new technologies and concepts outside of an academic setting. Therefore, I intend to continue working in the creative technology industry, preferably in a small innovative company as I do now. It is difficult for me to say where I want to be exactly 5 years from now as this industry tends to change a lot, opening up new opportunities and creating new professions. But if I had to guess, I would say it would be somewhere in between or a mixture of Art Director and Creative Coder.
